summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via an app-level AuthEntryDialog that auto-opens for unauthenticated users and an AuthEntryDialog effect that auto-closes on successful authentication while keeping error UI in the dialog. The diff also includes several unrelated UI/feature changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded a new generator mode ('prompt-studio' / 'Create Card With AI Prompt') with mode-specific UI and generation logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to make the existing auth dialog appear first and to close it cleanly after login; it does not request new generator modes or generation logic changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Output UI expanded to support 'Prompt Studio Mode' with card variations carousel, copy/share actions, and related prop corrections.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the auth-first flow requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple navigation/section anchor and styling changes across Templates/Examples/Pricing/FAQ/Footer/Legal sections (ids, scroll-mt-16, layout/styling, new links, UTM attribution, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request content/section/navigation redesign; only authentication-first behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Animation and viewport utility work (Reveal optimization, new/changed useInView and usePrefersReducedMotion hooks).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the auth-first flow change.
